item.title: melissa add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: melissa add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "When you're struggling with something, look at all the people around you and realize that every single person you see is struggling with something, and to them, it's just as hard as what you're going through." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: melissa add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I know that somehow, every step I took since the moment I could walk was a step towards finding you." -- Nicholas Sparks
